name: Bulking Simulator
description:
Game Description:

In "Bulking-Simulator", you play as a health enthusiast who wants to bulk up and get in shape. To do this, you must destroy unhealthy foods with your bare hands while digesting healthy ones with your body.

Your goal is to reach a weight of 80kg while limiting your intake of unhealthy foods to no more than 20. Be careful not to eat too many unhealthy foods or your progress will be hindered.

Use the A/D keys to control your character and navigate through the game. Destroy unhealthy foods and consume healthy ones to reach your goal and become the ultimate bulking champion.

Download "Bulking-Simulator" now on itch.io and start your journey towards a healthier you!

Note: I made this Game in 3hours.
